title: The Detonator
descriptions:
**The Detonator (2006)**

In this psychological thriller, John Pollard, a disturbed and disillusioned demolition expert, struggles with severe migraines and hallucinations that blur the lines between reality and delusion. After a failed relationship and a series of personal setbacks, John becomes increasingly unstable. He begins to see visions of a woman who urges him to take drastic actions. 

John's life spirals out of control when he starts to believe that he is being controlled by an external force, leading him to plan a series of bombings in his small town. As the tension builds, John's actions put the lives of those around him in danger, including the local sheriff who is trying to uncover the truth behind the bombings. The film culminates in a tense confrontation where John must face the consequences of his actions and the true nature of his psychological torment.
